Title: Lawfully
Plot: Dana is invited to a dinner party for Subaru, who want to sponsor her tennis career, but Lara is hurt when Dana takes her male doubles partner instead of her. Meanwhile, Tim is shocked when he catches Marina and Jenny in a compromising position, Alice tries to sort out the problems with her mother, and Bette tells her father about Tina's pregnancy, but is upset by his reaction.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Jennifer Copping,  Aaron Dudley,  Colin Foo,  Nicki Clyne,  Taayla Markell,  Mark Gibson,  Rachel Hayward,  Sean Carey,  Jeremy Beck,  Tahmoh Penikett,  Nolan Funk,  Matthew Currie Holmes,  Andrew McIlroy,  Robyn
